metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7980 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Cirrus CLGD 54xx VGA Emulator in Quick Emulator (Qemu) 2.8 and earlier allows local guest OS users to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors related to a VNC client updating its display after a VGA operation.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu3').
